text: Read our letter to .@POTUS regarding the importance of protecting our national security & nuclear deterrence: https://t.co/Z1Bwj7Xj9t
While no American wishes to employ nuclear weapons in conflict, I strongly oppose establishing a “no first use” policy.
President Obama has recently considered implementing a dangerous “no first use” nuclear weapons policy.

Praying for the victims, their families, & the city of #Dallas. The attack on law enforcement who work to protect us every day is horrific.
Transporting these juveniles to #AL instead of sending them back to their homes will only make the bad situation worse.
This Administration has failed in their handling of our southern border crisis, & moving these immigrants to #AL rewards illegal conduct.
